metadata.title: Daytime temperatures to remain 6-8 degrees Centigrade above normal in Sindh

content.article_body: KARACHI, Apr 14 (APP):Pakistan Meteorological Department on Monday predicted hot and dry weather for most parts of the Sindh province during the next 24 hours. Whereas, chances of gusty winds during afternoon are also predicted. The daytime temperatures would remain between 6 and 8 degrees Celsius above normal. Mainly, hot and dry weather is likely to prevail
